mapper.select:
SELECT st_statistics_record_attr.* FROM st_statistics_record_attr WHERE 1=1
AND st_statistics_record_attr.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{statisticsRecordAttr.id},'%')
AND st_statistics_record_attr.record_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{statisticsRecordAttr.recordId},'%')
AND st_statistics_record_attr.legend LIKE CONCAT('%',#{statisticsRecordAttr.legend},'%')
AND st_statistics_record_attr.index LIKE CONCAT('%',#{statisticsRecordAttr.index},'%')
